Index.title: New Remix App
Index.intro: The links in the sidebar are defined in the layout for your app, in app/routes/app.tsx. They're an App Bridge component that you can set up to embed links into Shopify Admin.

main.title: Get started querying data
main.intro: Use a GraphQL query to generate products.
